mutants.code:
def calculate_maximum_allowance(A: int, B: int, C: int) -> int:
    digits = sorted([A, B, C])
    max_formula = f'{digits[2]}{digits[1]}{digits[0]}'
    max_allowance = eval(max_formula)
    return max_allowance

def calculate_maximum_allowance(A: int, B: int, C: int) -> int:
    digits = sorted([A, B, C])
    max_formula = f'{digits[3]}{digits[1]}+{digits[0]}'
    max_allowance = eval(max_formula)
    return max_allowance
